name: The Flower Show
description:
Come to the flower show! One of the florists competing for Best in Show strikes up a conversation with a punter. He has many opinions about the other competitors, and is very happy to share them. 

Psalm 48: The Flower Show is a visual novel about flowers and petty artists. 

Psalms is an anthology of short digital fiction. Some entries are games, others are visual novels. And some - well, you'll see. Check in for new psalms every quarter.
